entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
